name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a skilled Software Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in **cloud-based architecture** and **distributed systems**, leveraging modern technologies such as **Go**, **Kubernetes**, and automated testing practices to deliver high-quality code. My proficiency in **library development** and implementing **Site Reliability Engineering** principles equips me to design and build robust solutions that prioritize system reliability and performance.

I have a proven track record in developing scalable applications with a focus on **NeuralSearch**, **keyword search**, and **vector search** functionalities, ensuring seamless integration and enhanced user experiences. My strong problem-solving capabilities, combined with effective communication skills, enable me to collaborate successfully across multifunctional teams.

Additionally, I possess expertise in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, along with a deep understanding of enterprise-grade platform development and compliance standards. I have effectively utilized tools such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** in my projects, advancing my knowledge in machine learning pipelines and MLOps workflows.
